ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: XP bonus?
ygData.msgSnippet: Sol A has a nice exp bonus. It s to encourage more ppl to go there....higher risk means greater reward. ... From: Mac  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Sol A has a nice exp bonus. It's to encourage more ppl to go there....higher
risk means greater reward.
----- Original Message -----
From: Mac <bigmaca3@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 24, 2003 1:17 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: XP bonus?


> Yes, certain areas give you a bonus. It applies to all experience
> gained in that zone. They're mostly dungeon type zones.
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Chris Talbot" <chris@c...> wrote:
> > Hi, everybody.
> >
> > This might be a stupid newbie question, but maybe someone might be
> willing
> > to answer it for me: I noticed on EQAtlas.com that a few dungeon
> zones are
> > listed as having an experience bonus (usually listed as 13% when it
> > applies). Can anyone tell me how this works? Or is it as I assume
> and it's
> > an XP bonus for each kill made in that zone?
> >
> > Chris
>
>
>
